about_the_game:
Killing dinosaurs with style!

Phoenix International has opened its vaults with the Mercenary Megapack, providing a wealth of different looks for a wide range of weaponry. From the humble shotgun to the fiesty flameslammer, there's a variety of paint jobs and finishes to unleash on your scaley enemies.

But that's not all!

  • Suit up as Agent Trapper, practice medicine with the Labcoat Scientist, or clean up the island as Dinobuster Pyro!

  • Complete the look with dozens of cosmetic attachments, ranging from stylish sunglasses to fishing hats and sombreros.

  • After opening up a can of whoopass, spread some sass with several taunts for your mercs!

FULL ITEM LIST:

  • Classic Shotgun
  • Desert Camo Shotgun
  • Digital Camo Shotgun
  • Ember shotgun
  • Fire Flower Sniper Rifle
  • Jungle Sniper Rifle
  • Paisley Sniper

Killing dinosaurs with style!

Phoenix International has opened its vaults with the Mercenary Megapack, providing a wealth of different looks for a wide range of weaponry. From the humble shotgun to the fiesty flameslammer, there's a variety of paint jobs and finishes to unleash on your scaley enemies.

But that's not all!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz+ Single-Core CPU
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0GHz+ Multi-Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space

short_description: Go dino slaying in STYLE with over 100 mercenary cosmetics!
